## Introduction

My name is Talia Kuras, and I am a PhD student at the University of New Hampshire studying Saltmarsh Sparrow reproductive behavior and responses to habitat restoration. 

## Goals

My research is oriented around the conservation of Saltmarsh Sparrows at key sites in New Hampshire and Southern Maine.

## Education

I have a BS in Biology from the University of Massachusetts-Amherst, and a MS in Wildlife and Conservation Biology from UNH. 

## Experience
In addition to my educational experience, I have worked as a wildlife field technician for numerous entities across the Atlantic coast region!
:::
